sectiontype.name: ZConfigParser.basic.mapping
sectiontype.description:
Section that provides a simple mapping implementation. An application should derive a more specific section type for use in configuration files:
<import package="ZConfigParser.components.basic" file="mapping.xml" />
<sectiontype name="mapping" extends="ZConfigParser.basic.mapping" />
If a non-standard keytype is needed, it can be overridden as well:
<sectiontype name="system-map" extends="ZConfigParser.basic.mapping" keytype="mypkg.datatypes.system_name" />
